modName: Garrett Hawke - Dragon Age 2 - Level 1 clean save
summary: Play as Garrett Hawke from the Dragon Age 2 game.
descriptionHtml:
Please, help a fellow artist make more friendly/beautiful faces for yer \'ol Skyrim adventures: 
Endorse if you\'re using it/liking it!

Character made entirely by me (so no law infringement here) created from this clean save file (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14263//?). Endorse it if you liked it  =)

==== Update v 1.1 ====
+ Corrected some face proportions/colors
+ Added an optional \"blood smear\" warpaint
+ Male skin texture replacer now optional
+ Corrected some minor bugs on the file, so it is a clean save!



His characteristics are listed below:

Garrett Hawke, Level 1, male Imperial

+ Not leveled yet
+ Finished up small riverwood quests and chatter
+ Bleak Falls Barrows quest completed
+ Completed some minor errands in Whiterun
+ Greybeards initial quests completed
+ Already killed Durnehviir

_________________________________________________


REQUIRED MODS:

+ The Eyes of Beauty (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/?)
+ ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_1  (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?)
+ ApachiiSkyHair and Beard Retexture Wild Look (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10357//?)



OPTIONAL (but really cool):

+ MacKoms Real Skin for Men (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28879/?)
+ Since I couldn\'t manage to  create one, download this blood smear from this file: (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4761//?) 

Kudos for the guy who manage to make it

________________________________________________


RECOMMENDED MOD:

A certain armor from the same game this character came from... I know you can find it somewhere in the internetz...    ;)

_________________________________________________


HOW TO INSTALL:

Extract to C:\\Users\\YOUR USER NAME\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves
Extract the \"blood smear\" file to:    Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\character asstes\\tintmasks

It will replace a warpaint file

_________________________________________________


A few important considerations:
+ I tried to \"merge\" some of his face characteristics from CGI Hawke and In-game Hawke (from Dragon Age 2, obviously), so that\'s the result
+ You\'re free not to like, but please be polite if that\'s the case
+ Yeah, I know his hair is mirrowed, but the other hair I intended to use looked ostensibly gay, so no.
+ I didn\'t tried many combinations of eyes/mouth, but I\'m fairly certain the face proportions are correct, if you can make it more related to the original please let me know!


*** I\'m not a modder so please be aware that I made this from a clean save (from file listed above) but I was using mods during this character creation. Enjoy, and please endorse!!!
author: dantheowl
